title: Spear Trap
summaries: The Spear Trap is a trap found naturally in the Jungle Temple and, rarely, outside the Temple's door. When activated, it launches a spear in a straight line that can pierce an infinite number of targets and retracts upon hitting a solid block or reaching its maximum range of 19.5 tiles. It has a cooldown of (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1.5 seconds / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 2 seconds between firings. The spear deal 120 / 240 / 360 damage to players (60 damage to NPCs, enemies, and critters).
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Spear Traps can be rotated 90° with a hammer.
(Old-gen console and 3DS versions) Unlike Lihzahrd Bricks, breaking Spear Traps does not require the Picksaw.
